tool.name: Manhattan and QQ Plot

param.name: input_file
param.label: GWAS Summary Statistics (must contain CHR, BP, and P columns)

tool.help:
This tool generates a Manhattan plot and a QQ plot from GWAS summary statistics. Input must be a tab-separated file with at least the following columns: - **CHR**: Chromosome number - **BP**: Base-pair position - **P**: p-value for the association
Example input: ``` CHR BP P 1 12345 0.0001 1 54321 0.05 ... ```
Outputs: - Manhattan Plot (PNG) - QQ Plot (PNG)
